content:
TITLE: Updating a Stripe Customer Resource
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to update an existing customer resource in Stripe. This example updates a customer's email address.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
var options = new CustomerUpdateOptions
{
    Email = "updated-email@example.com"
};

var service = new CustomerService();
Customer customer = service.Update("cus_123", options);

// The updated customer is returned
Console.WriteLine(customer.Email);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Listing Stripe Resources with Auto-Pagination
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to list all customer resources using auto-pagination, which automatically iterates through all pages of results.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
var service = new CustomerService();
var customers = service.ListAutoPaging();

// Enumerate all pages of the list
foreach (Customer customer in customers)
{
   Console.WriteLine(customer.Email);
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Stripe.NET using .NET Core CLI
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to install the Stripe.NET package using the .NET Core command-line interface tools.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
dotnet add package Stripe.net
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating a Stripe Customer Resource
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to create a new customer resource in Stripe. This example creates a customer with an email address and returns the newly created customer object.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
var options = new CustomerCreateOptions
{
    Email = "customer@example.com"
};

var service = new CustomerService();
Customer customer = service.Create(options);

// Newly created customer is returned
Console.WriteLine(customer.Email);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Application Info for Stripe Plugin Development
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to identify your application or plugin when using Stripe.NET. This information is passed along with API requests to Stripe.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_15

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
StripeConfiguration.AppInfo = new AppInfo
{
    Name = "MyAwesomePlugin",
    Url = "https://myawesomeplugin.info",
    Version = "1.2.34",
};
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Retrieving a Stripe Customer Resource
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to retrieve an existing customer resource from Stripe using its ID.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
var service = new CustomerService();
Customer customer = service.Get("cus_1234");

Console.WriteLine(customer.Email);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Automatic Retries for Stripe API Calls
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to configure the maximum number of automatic retries for intermittent failures in Stripe API calls.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_12

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
StripeConfiguration.MaxNetworkRetries = 0; // Zero retries
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Stripe API Key for Authentication
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to set the Stripe API key for authentication. The secret key is used to authenticate all API requests to Stripe.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
StripeConfiguration.ApiKey = "sk_test_...";
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using Undocumented Parameters in Stripe API Requests
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to use the AddExtraParam method to pass undocumented or beta parameters to Stripe API requests.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_13

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
var options = new CustomerCreateOptions
{
    Email = "jenny.rosen@example.com"
}
options.AddExtraParam("secret_feature_enabled", "true");
options.AddExtraParam("secret_parameter[primary]", "primary value");
options.AddExtraParam("secret_parameter[secondary]", "secondary value");

var service = new CustomerService();
var customer = service.Create(options);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Deleting a Stripe Customer Resource
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to delete an existing customer resource from Stripe using its ID.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
var service = new CustomerService();
Customer customer = service.Delete("cus_123", options);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Making Custom Raw Requests to Undocumented Stripe APIs
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to send raw HTTP requests to undocumented Stripe APIs, bypassing the method definitions in the library. Useful for private beta features or custom requests.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_19

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
StripeClient client = new StripeClient();
StripeResponse response = await client.RawRequestAsync(HttpMethod.Get, "/v1/accounts/acc_123");

// Optionally use Deserialize to convert the response to strongly-typed object.
Account account = client.Deserialize<Account>(response.Content)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Migrating to StripeClient Pattern in .NET SDK v46
DESCRIPTION: Example showing migration from static configuration to using StripeClient instance for service access. This supports using multiple clients with different configurations and improves discoverability of available services via property inspection.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: csharp
CODE:
```
// Before (using static configuration)
StripeConfiguration.ApiKey = apiKey;
var svc = new CustomerService();
svc.Get(customerId);

// After (using StripeClient)
var client = new StripeClient(apiKey);
client.V1.Customers.Get(customerId)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Disabling Telemetry for Stripe API Calls
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to disable the telemetry that Stripe.NET sends to Stripe regarding request latency and feature usage.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_16

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
StripeConfiguration.EnableTelemetry = false;
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Listing Stripe Resources with Manual Pagination
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to list customer resources page by page, manually handling pagination using the StartingAfter parameter.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
var service = new CustomerService();
var customers = service.List();

string lastId = null;

// Enumerate the first page of the list
foreach (Customer customer in customers)
{
   lastId = customer.Id;
   Console.WriteLine(customer.Email);
}

customers = service.List(new CustomerListOptions()
{
    StartingAfter = lastId,
});

// Enumerate the subsequent page
foreach (Customer customer in customers)
{
   lastId = customer.Id;
   Console.WriteLine(customer.Email);
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Stripe.NET using NuGet CLI
DESCRIPTION: Shows the command to install Stripe.NET package using the NuGet Command Line Interface.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
nuget install Stripe.net
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Per-Request Options for Stripe API Calls
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to set per-request configuration options such as idempotency keys, Stripe Connect authentication, and custom API keys.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
var requestOptions = new RequestOptions();
requestOptions.ApiKey = "SECRET API KEY";
requestOptions.IdempotencyKey = "SOME STRING";
requestOptions.StripeAccount = "CONNECTED ACCOUNT ID";
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating Stripe .NET Library to Version 44.3.0
DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the changes in version 44.3.0, including new methods for invoices, additional options for checkout sessions, and support for MobilePay.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
## 44.3.0 - 2024-04-18
* [#2894](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/pull/2894) Update generated code
  * Add support for `CreatePreview` method on resource `Invoice`
  * Add support for `PaymentMethodData` on `Checkout.SessionCreateOptions`
  * Add support for `SavedPaymentMethodOptions` on `Checkout.SessionCreateOptions` and `CheckoutSession`
  * Add support for `Mobilepay` on `CheckoutSessionPaymentMethodOptionsOptions` and `CheckoutSessionPaymentMethodOptions`
  * Add support for `AllowRedisplay` on `ConfirmationTokenPaymentMethodDataOptions`, `CustomerListPaymentMethodsOptions`, `PaymentIntentPaymentMethodDataOptions`, `PaymentMethodCreateOptions`, `PaymentMethodUpdateOptions`, and `SetupIntentPaymentMethodDataOptions`
  * Add support for `ScheduleDetails` and `SubscriptionDetails` on `InvoiceUpcomingLinesOptions` and `InvoiceUpcomingOptions`
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using a Custom HttpClient with Stripe
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to configure Stripe.NET with a custom HttpClient instance for advanced networking scenarios like proxy servers or custom message handlers.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_11

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
StripeConfiguration.StripeClient = new StripeClient(
    apiKey,
    httpClient: new SystemNetHttpClient(httpClient));
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating Stripe .NET Library to Version 44.2.0
DESCRIPTION: This snippet outlines the changes in version 44.2.0, including new resources for entitlements, updates to account sessions, and support for Swish payments.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
## 44.2.0 - 2024-04-16
* [#2891](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/pull/2891) Update generated code
  * Add support for new resource `Entitlements.ActiveEntitlementSummary`
  * Add support for `Balances` and `PayoutsList` on `AccountSessionComponentsOptions` and `AccountSessionComponents`
  * Remove support for `Config` on `Forwarding.RequestCreateOptions` and `ForwardingRequest`. This field is no longer used by the Forwarding Request API.
  * Add support for `CaptureMethod` on `PaymentIntentPaymentMethodOptionsRevolutPayOptions` and `PaymentIntentPaymentMethodOptionsRevolutPay`
  * Add support for `Swish` on `PaymentMethodConfigurationCreateOptions`, `PaymentMethodConfigurationUpdateOptions`, and `PaymentMethodConfiguration`
* [#2892](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/pull/2892) Add sections to StripeTypeRegistry
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating Stripe .NET Library to Version 44.1.0
DESCRIPTION: This snippet details the changes in version 44.1.0, including new support for account sessions, Amazon Pay, and financial connections account ownership refresh.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
## 44.1.0 - 2024-04-11
* [#2889](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/pull/2889) Update generated code
  * Add support for `AccountManagement` and `NotificationBanner` on `AccountSessionComponentsOptions` and `AccountSessionComponents`
  * Add support for `ExternalAccountCollection` on `AccountSessionComponentsAccountOnboardingFeaturesOptions` and `AccountSessionComponentsAccountOnboardingFeatures`
  * Change type of `BillingMeterEventAdjustmentCancel` from `BillingMeterResourceBillingMeterEventAdjustmentCancel` to `nullable(BillingMeterResourceBillingMeterEventAdjustmentCancel)`
  * Add support for `AmazonPay` on `ChargePaymentMethodDetails`, `CheckoutSessionPaymentMethodOptionsOptions`, `CheckoutSessionPaymentMethodOptions`, `ConfirmationTokenPaymentMethodDataOptions`, `ConfirmationTokenPaymentMethodPreview`, `PaymentIntentPaymentMethodDataOptions`, `PaymentIntentPaymentMethodOptionsOptions`, `PaymentIntentPaymentMethodOptions`, `PaymentMethodConfigurationCreateOptions`, `PaymentMethodConfigurationUpdateOptions`, `PaymentMethodConfiguration`, `PaymentMethodCreateOptions`, `PaymentMethod`, `RefundDestinationDetails`, `SetupIntentPaymentMethodDataOptions`, `SetupIntentPaymentMethodOptionsOptions`, and `SetupIntentPaymentMethodOptions`
  * Add support for `NextRefreshAvailableAt` on `FinancialConnectionsAccountOwnershipRefresh`
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding Support for Tax Settings in Stripe .NET Library
DESCRIPTION: Version 41.24.0 introduces support for the new Tax.Settings resource, allowing retrieval and updating of tax settings. It also adds new fields to existing objects like Charge and PaymentIntent.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_13

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
// Example of using new Tax.Settings resource
var service = new Tax.SettingsService();
var settings = await service.GetAsync();

var updateOptions = new Tax.SettingsUpdateOptions
{
    // Set new tax settings
};
var updatedSettings = await service.UpdateAsync(updateOptions);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding Boleto and OXXO Payment Support in C#
DESCRIPTION: Adds support for Boleto and OXXO payment methods on various Stripe objects including AccountCapabilities, Checkout.SessionPaymentMethodOptions, and others.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_33

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
AccountCapabilities.BoletoPayments
Checkout.SessionPaymentMethodOptions.Boleto
Checkout.SessionPaymentMethodOptions.Oxxo
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding Tax ID Collection Support in C#
DESCRIPTION: Adds support for tax ID collection on Checkout Session creation and retrieval.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_34

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
Session.Create(new SessionCreateOptions { TaxIdCollection = new SessionTaxIdCollectionOptions { Enabled = true } });

var session = Session.Get(id);
var taxIdCollectionEnabled = session.TaxIdCollection.Enabled;
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding Support for Listing Charges by PaymentIntent ID in C#
DESCRIPTION: Adds functionality to list Charges filtered by a specific PaymentIntent ID in the Stripe .NET library.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_49

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
Support listing Charges by PaymentIntent id
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding Treasury Webhook Endpoints in Stripe .NET
DESCRIPTION: Code that adds Treasury-related webhook event constants to the Stripe .NET library. These constants are used to identify different types of webhook events related to Treasury features.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_20

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
* [#2488](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/pull/2488) Add Treasury webhook endpoints.
  * Add event constants `TreasuryCheckDepositCanceled`, `TreasuryCheckDepositCreated`, `TreasuryCheckDepositProcessing`, `TreasuryCheckDepositReceived`, `TreasuryCheckDepositRequiresAction`, `TreasuryCheckDepositRequiresConfirmation`, `TreasuryCheckDepositReversed`, `Treasury.CreditReversalCreated`, `Treasury.CreditReversalPosted`, `Treasury.DebitReversalCompleted`, `Treasury.DebitReversalCreated`, `Treasury.DebitReversalInitialCreditGranted`, `Treasury.FinancialAccountClosed`, `Treasury.FinancialAccountCreated`, `Treasury.FinancialAccountFeaturesStatusUpdated`, `Treasury.InboundTransferCanceled`, `Treasury.InboundTransferCreated`, `Treasury.InboundTransferFailed`, `Treasury.InboundTransferSucceeded`, `Treasury.OutboundPaymentCanceled`, `Treasury.OutboundPaymentCreated`, `Treasury.OutboundPaymentExpectedArrivalDateUpdated`, `Treasury.OutboundPaymentFailed`, `Treasury.OutboundPaymentPosted`, `Treasury.OutboundPaymentReturned`, `Treasury.OutboundTransferCanceled`, `Treasury.OutboundTransferCreated`, `Treasury.OutboundTransferExpectedArrivalDateUpdated`, `Treasury.OutboundTransferFailed`, `Treasury.OutboundTransferPosted`, `Treasury.OutboundTransferReturned`, `Treasury.ReceivedCreditCreated`, `Treasury.ReceivedCreditFailed`, `Treasury.ReceivedCreditReversed`, `Treasury.ReceivedCreditSucceeded`, and `Treasury.ReceivedDebitCreated`.
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding PendingUpdate and ProrationBehavior to Subscription APIs in C#
DESCRIPTION: Adds support for PendingUpdate and ProrationBehavior properties on Subscription API calls.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_39

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
public class Subscription
{
    public PendingUpdate PendingUpdate { get; set; }
    public string ProrationBehavior { get; set; }
    // Other properties
}
```

TITLE: Hardening ValidateSignature Against Invalid Input in Stripe .NET
DESCRIPTION: Security improvement that makes the webhook signature validation more robust against malformed or invalid input.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_27

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
* [#2468](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/pull/2468) Harden ValidateSignature against invalid input
```

TITLE: Adding Metadata Support to Checkout Session in C#
DESCRIPTION: Adds support for setting Metadata on Checkout Session objects.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_38

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
public class Session
{
    public Dictionary<string, string> Metadata { get; set; }
    // Other properties
}
```

TITLE: Fixing SEPA Debit Deserialization on MandatePaymentMethodDetails in C#
DESCRIPTION: Fixes an issue with deserializing SEPA debit information on MandatePaymentMethodDetails objects.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_41

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```

{
    public SepaDebit SepaDebit { get; set; }
    // Other properties
}
```

TITLE: New Method Example in Version 45.2.0
DESCRIPTION: Addition of new methods AddLines, RemoveLines, and UpdateLines on the Invoice resource, along with PostedAt support for Tax Transaction creation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
// New Invoice methods
Invoice.AddLines();
Invoice.RemoveLines();
Invoice.UpdateLines();

// New Tax Transaction options
var options = new Tax.TransactionCreateFromCalculationOptions { PostedAt = DateTime.Now };
```

TITLE: Improving Support for SpendingLimits on Issuing Card in C#
DESCRIPTION: Enhances support for the SpendingLimits property on Issuing Card objects.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_43

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
public class Card
{
    public SpendingLimits SpendingLimits { get; set; }
    // Other properties
}
```

TITLE: Accessing Undocumented Properties from Stripe API Responses
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to access undocumented or beta properties from Stripe API responses using the RawJObject property.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_14

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
var service = new CustomerService();
var customer = service.Get("cus_1234");

customer.RawJObject["secret_feature_enabled"];
customer.RawJObject["secret_parameter"]["primary"];
customer.RawJObject["secret_parameter"]["secondary"];
```

TITLE: Adding Public Service.Client Setter in C#
DESCRIPTION: Adds a public setter for the Client property on Service objects.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_44

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
public class Service
{
    public IHttpClient Client { get; set; }
    // Other properties and methods
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding Automatic Tax Calculation Support in C#
DESCRIPTION: Adds support for automatic tax calculation on various Stripe objects including Checkout Session, Invoice, Subscription, and others.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_35

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
var options = new SessionCreateOptions
{
    AutomaticTax = new SessionAutomaticTaxOptions { Enabled = true }
};
var session = Session.Create(options);

var invoice = Invoice.Create(new InvoiceCreateOptions
{
    AutomaticTax = new InvoiceAutomaticTaxOptions { Enabled = true }
});
```

SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_46

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
public class Account
{
    public bool ExecutivesProvided { get; set; }
    // Other properties
}
```

TITLE: Search API Implementation Entry
DESCRIPTION: Documentation of adding support for Search API across multiple resources including Charge, Customer, Invoice, PaymentIntent, Price, Product, and Subscription.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_31

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
## 39.101.0 - 2022-03-29
* [#2443](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/pull/2443) API Updates
  * Add support for Search API
     * Add support for `Search` method on resources `Charge`, `Customer`, `Invoice`, `PaymentIntent`, `Price`, `Product`, and `Subscription`
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Removing Deprecated SKU Resource in C#
DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the removal of the deprecated 'Sku' resource as part of breaking changes in a major version update. It also removes other deprecated properties and unused classes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_18

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
Removed deprecated `Sku` resource (#2588)
Removed `LineItem.Product` property that was released by mistake. (#2587)
Removed deprecated `SessionSubscriptionDataOptions.Items` property. (#2587)
Removed deprecated `Amount`, `Currency`, `Description`, `Images`, `Name` properties from `SessionLineItemOptions` (https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/pull/2604)
Removed `Charges` field on `PaymentIntent` and replace it with `LatestCharge`. (https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/pull/2604)
Removed unused `SessionDisplayItem` class. (#2588)
Removed unused `SessionDisplayItemCustom` class. (#2588)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding Search Methods to InvoiceService in Stripe .NET
DESCRIPTION: Pull request that adds search functionality to the InvoiceService class, enabling searching for invoices with specific criteria.

```
* [#2485](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/pull/2485) Add search methods to InvoiceService
```

```
Mark `OperatorAccount` as deprecated across all Terminal APIs
```

TITLE: Adding StartDate Property to Subscription in C#

```
Add `StartDate` to `Subscription`
```

TITLE: Running Filtered Tests
DESCRIPTION: Command to run specific tests by filtering with test name pattern using the dotnet test command.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_22

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:

```
dotnet test src --filter FullyQualifiedName~InvoiceServiceTest
```

TITLE: Formatting Code
DESCRIPTION: Commands to run the code formatter using either just command or dotnet format directly.

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
just format
# or: dotnet format src/Stripe.net.sln
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding Support for New API Fields in C#
DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the addition of support for new API fields like 'FlowData' on BillingPortal.SessionCreateOptions and 'Flow' on BillingPortal.Session. It also adds support for 'IndiaInternationalPayments' on AccountCapabilitiesOptions and AccountCapabilities.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_17

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
Add support for `FlowData` on `BillingPortal.SessionCreateOptions`
Add support for `Flow` on `BillingPortal.Session`
Add support for `IndiaInternationalPayments` on `AccountCapabilitiesOptions` and `AccountCapabilities`
Add support for `InvoiceCreation` on `Checkout.SessionCreateOptions` and `Checkout.Session`
Add support for `Invoice` on `Checkout.Session`
Add support for `Metadata` on `SubscriptionSchedulePhasesItemsOptions` and `SubscriptionSchedulePhasesItems`
```

TITLE: Cleaning Up .NET Project Files in Stripe .NET
DESCRIPTION: Maintenance task to clean up and standardize the project files in the Stripe .NET repository.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_28

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
* [#2467](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/pull/2467) Cleanup .NET project files
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Beta API Version Headers
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to set up beta API version headers for accessing Stripe beta features. This configuration can only be used with beta versions of Stripe.NET.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_18

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
StripeConfiguration.AddBetaVersion("feature_beta", "v3");
```

TITLE: Updating Stripe .NET Library to Version 43.23.0
DESCRIPTION: This snippet outlines the changes in version 43.23.0, including new resources for entitlements and features, and additional support for account creation and billing meter events.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
## 43.23.0 - 2024-04-09
* [#2887](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/pull/2887) Update generated code
  * Add support for new resources `Entitlements.ActiveEntitlement` and `Entitlements.Feature`
  * Add support for `Get` and `List` methods on resource `ActiveEntitlement`
  * Add support for `Create`, `Get`, `List`, and `Update` methods on resource `Feature`
  * Add support for `Controller` on `AccountCreateOptions`
  * Add support for `Fees`, `Losses`, `RequirementCollection`, and `StripeDashboard` on `AccountController`
  * Add support for `EventName` on `Billing.MeterEventAdjustmentCreateOptions` and `BillingMeterEventAdjustment`
  * Add support for `Cancel` and `Type` on `BillingMeterEventAdjustment`
```

TITLE: Updating Stripe .NET Library to Version 44.5.0
DESCRIPTION: This snippet outlines the changes made in version 44.5.0 of the Stripe .NET library, including new support for PayPal disputes, payment method types, and tax registration options.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
## 44.5.0 - 2024-05-02
* [#2900](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/pull/2900) Update generated code
  * Add support for `Paypal` on `DisputePaymentMethodDetails`
  * Change type of `DisputePaymentMethodDetailsType` from `literal('card')` to `enum('card'|'paypal')`
  * Add support for `PaymentMethodTypes` on `PaymentIntentConfirmOptions`
  * Add support for `ShipFromDetails` on `Tax.CalculationCreateOptions`, `TaxCalculation`, and `TaxTransaction`
  * Add support for `Bh`, `Eg`, `Ge`, `Ke`, `Kz`, `Ng`, and `Om` on `TaxRegistrationCountryOptionsOptions` and `TaxRegistrationCountryOptions`
* [#2904](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/pull/2904) Add config for dotnet8.0
* [#2903](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/pull/2903) Fix clientId getter
```

TITLE: Updating Stripe .NET Library to Version 44.4.0
DESCRIPTION: This snippet details the changes in version 44.4.0, including new support for setup future usage on various payment methods and updates to entitlement features.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
## 44.4.0 - 2024-04-25
* [#2897](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/pull/2897) Update generated code
  * Add support for `SetupFutureUsage` on `CheckoutSessionPaymentMethodOptionsAmazonPay`, `CheckoutSessionPaymentMethodOptionsRevolutPay`, `PaymentIntentPaymentMethodOptionsAmazonPay`, and `PaymentIntentPaymentMethodOptionsRevolutPay`
  * Change type of `EntitlementsActiveEntitlementFeature` from `string` to `expandable($Entitlements.Feature)`
  * Remove support for inadvertently released identity verification features `Email` and `Phone` on `IdentityVerificationSessionOptionsOptions`
  * Add support for `AmazonPay` and `RevolutPay` on `MandatePaymentMethodDetails` and `SetupAttemptPaymentMethodDetails`
  * Add support for `EndingBefore`, `Limit`, and `StartingAfter` on `PaymentMethodConfigurationListOptions`
  * Add support for `Mobilepay` on `PaymentMethodConfigurationCreateOptions`, `PaymentMethodConfigurationUpdateOptions`, and `PaymentMethodConfiguration`
```

TITLE: Updating Stripe .NET Library to Version 41.16.0
DESCRIPTION: This changelog entry details the updates made in version 41.16.0 of the Stripe .NET library. It includes new support for PayPal, network tokens, and various tax-related fields across multiple Stripe objects.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_14

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
## 41.16.0 - 2023-05-11
* [#2692](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/pull/2692) Update generated code
  * Add support for `Paypal` on `ChargePaymentMethodDetails`, `Checkout.SessionPaymentMethodOptionsOptions`, `MandatePaymentMethodDetails`, `PaymentIntentPaymentMethodDataOptions`, `PaymentIntentPaymentMethodOptionsOptions`, `PaymentIntentPaymentMethodOptions`, `PaymentMethodCreateOptions`, `PaymentMethod`, `SetupAttemptPaymentMethodDetails`, `SetupIntentPaymentMethodDataOptions`, `SetupIntentPaymentMethodOptionsOptions`, and `SetupIntentPaymentMethodOptions`
  * Add support for `NetworkToken` on `ChargePaymentMethodDetailsCard`
  * Add support for `TaxabilityReason` and `TaxableAmount` on `Checkout.SessionShippingCostTaxes`, `Checkout.SessionTotalDetailsBreakdownTaxes`, `CreditNoteShippingCostTaxes`, `CreditNoteTaxAmounts`, `InvoiceShippingCostTaxes`, `InvoiceTotalTaxAmounts`, `LineItemTaxes`, `QuoteComputedRecurringTotalDetailsBreakdownTaxes`, `QuoteComputedUpfrontTotalDetailsBreakdownTaxes`, and `QuoteTotalDetailsBreakdownTaxes`
  * Add support for `Brand`, `CardholderName`, `Country`, `ExpMonth`, `ExpYear`, `Fingerprint`, `Funding`, `Last4`, `Networks`, and `ReadMethod` on `PaymentMethodCardPresent` and `PaymentMethodInteracPresent`
  * Add support for `PreferredLocales` on `PaymentMethodInteracPresent`
  * Add support for `EffectivePercentage` on `TaxRate`
  * Add support for `GbBankTransfer ` and `JpBankTransfer ` on `CustomerCashBalanceTransactionFundedBankTransfer`
```

```
  - IssuingTransactionPurchaseDetailsFuelOptions
```

TITLE: Major Update to Stripe .NET Library Version 44.0.0
DESCRIPTION: This snippet outlines significant breaking changes and updates in version 44.0.0, including API version changes, property type modifications, and removal of deprecated features.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
## 44.0.0 - 2024-04-10
* [#2884](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/pull/2884) 
  
  * This release changes the pinned API version to `2024-04-10`. Please read the [API Upgrade Guide](https://stripe.com/docs/upgrades#2024-04-10) and carefully review the API changes before upgrading.
  
  ### ⚠️ Breaking changes
  
  * Change the property `Amount` on `SourceTransaction` to not be nullable
  * Remove the below unused classes
      * `InvoiceLineItemAutomaticTaxOptions`
      * `InvoiceLineItemCustomerDetailsOptions`
      * `InvoiceLineItemCustomerDetailsTaxIdOptions`
      * `InvoiceLineItemCustomerDetailsTaxOptions`
  * Change the type of the below date fields from `long` to `DateTime` 
      * `AccountSettingsCardIssuingTosAcceptance.Date`
      * `AccountSettingsTreasuryTosAcceptance.Date`
      * `PaymentIntentNextActionPixDisplayQrCode.ExpiresAt`
      * `PaymentIntentPaymentMethodOptionsPix.ExpiresAt`
      * `CalculationCreateOptions.TaxDate`
  * Rename `Features` to `MarketingFeatures` on `ProductCreateOptions`, `ProductUpdateOptions`, and `Product`.
  
  #### ⚠️ Removal of enum values, properties and events that are no longer part of the publicly documented Stripe API
   * Remove `BillingPortal.ConfigurationFeatures.SubscriptionPause` and `BillingPortal.ConfigurationFeaturesOptions.SubscriptionPause` as the feature to pause subscription on the portal has been deprecated.
   * Remove the below deprecated events from `Event.Type`, `WebhookEndpointCreateOptions.EnabledEvents`, `WebhookEndpointUpdateOptions.EnabledEvents` and the constants in `Events`
     * `invoiceitem.updated`
     * `order.created`
     * `recipient.created`
     * `recipient.deleted`
     * `recipient.updated`
     * `sku.created`
     * `sku.deleted`
     * `sku.updated`
   * Remove the support for the below deprecated values in `BalanceTransaction.Type`
      * `obligation_inbound`
      * `obligation_payout`
      * `obligation_payout_failure`
      * `obligation_reversal_outbound`
   * Remove the support for `various` in `Climate.Supplier.RemovalPathway` 
   * Remove support for `id_bank_transfer`, `multibanco`, `netbanking`, `pay_by_bank`, and `upi` on `PaymentMethodConfiguration` by removing the below classes
     * `PaymentMethodConfigurationIdBankTransfer`
     * `PaymentMethodConfigurationMultibanco`
     * `PaymentMethodConfigurationNetbanking`
     * `PaymentMethodConfigurationPayByBank`
     * `PaymentMethodConfigurationUpi`
   * Remove the support for `challenge_only` in `SetupIntentPaymentMethodOptionsCard.RequestThreeDSecure`
   * Remove deprecated property `CustomerData` on `SourceTransaction`
   * Remove the support for deprecated value `service_tax` in `TaxRate.TaxType`, `TaxRateCreateParams.TaxType`, `TaxRateUpdateParams.TaxType`
   * Remove the deprecated value `include_and_require` in `InvoiceCreateParams.PendingInvoiceItemsBehavior`
   * Remove the deprecated property `SubscriptionProrate` on `UpcomingInvoiceListLineItemsOptions`. Use `SubscriptionProrationBehavior` instead.
   * Remove the property `RequestIncrementalAuthorization` on `PaymentIntentPaymentMethodOptionsCardPresentOptions`. This was shipped by mistake.
   * Remove the support for deprecated value `obligation` on `ReportRunParameterOptions.ReportingCategory`
   * Remove the legacy field `RenderingOptions` in `Invoice`, `InvoiceCreateOptions` and `InvoiceUpdateOptions`.
   * Rename the type of field `Rendering` in `InvoiceCreateOptions` and `InvoiceUpdateOptions` from `InvoiceRenderingOptionsOptions` to `InvoiceRenderingOptions`
```

TITLE: Breaking Changes in Stripe .NET Library Version 42.0.0
DESCRIPTION: This major update includes several breaking changes, such as removal of deprecated fields and changes to existing field types. It also updates the pinned API version to 2023-08-16.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_12

LANGUAGE: C#
CODE:
```
// Example of a breaking change:
// Old code (no longer works)
var options = new CheckoutSessionSubscriptionDataOptions
{
    Coupon = "COUPON_CODE",
    TrialFromPlan = true
};

// New code (after migration to Prices API)
var options = new CheckoutSessionSubscriptionDataOptions
{
    // Use Prices API instead
};
```

TITLE: Version Updates Markdown Documentation
DESCRIPTION: Changelog entries documenting version updates from 43.13.0 to 43.22.0, including new features, API changes, and improvements to the Stripe .NET SDK
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
## 43.22.0 - 2024-04-04
* [#2881](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/pull/2881) Update generated code
  * Change type of `CheckoutSessionPaymentMethodOptionsSwishReferenceOptions` from `emptyable(string)` to `string`
  * Add support for `SubscriptionItem` on `Discount`
  * Add support for `Email` and `Phone` on `IdentityVerificationReport`
  * Add support for `VerificationFlow` on `Identity.VerificationSessionCreateOptions`
  * Add support for `ProvidedDetails` on `Identity.VerificationSessionCreateOptions`
  * Add support for `PromotionCode` on `InvoiceDiscountsOptions`
  * Add support for `Discounts` on `InvoiceSubscriptionItemsOptions`
  * Add support for `AllowedMerchantCountries` and `BlockedMerchantCountries` on `IssuingCardSpendingControlsOptions`
  * Add support for `Zip` on `PaymentMethodConfigurationCreateOptions`
  * Add support for `Offline` on `SetupAttemptPaymentMethodDetailsCardPresent`
  * Add support for `CardPresent` on `SetupIntentPaymentMethodOptionsOptions`
```

```
## 17.2.0 - 2018-07-13
```

TITLE: Documenting Stripe .NET Library Changelog in Markdown
DESCRIPTION: This Markdown document outlines the version history of the Stripe .NET library, including links to pull requests, bug fixes, and new feature additions. It covers versions from 11.8.2 down to 11.0.0, with each entry detailing specific changes and improvements.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_52

LANGUAGE: Markdown
CODE:
```
## 11.8.2 - 2017-11-23
* [#1054](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/pull/1054) Fix file uploading when the extension is not known
* [#1055](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/pull/1055) Fix `DueDate` encoding for `StripeInvoiceCreateOptions`

## 11.8.1 - 2017-11-22
* [#1060](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/pull/1060) Fix invoice listing

## 11.8.0 - 2017-11-21
* [#1056](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/pull/1056) Add `Automatic` for `StripePayout`
* [#1057](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/pull/1057) Support for passing extra parameters
* [#1058](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/pull/1058) Add `Paid` for `StripeInvoiceListOptions`

## 11.7.1 - 2017-10-31
* [#1050](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/pull/1050) Make exchange rate APIs singular (released as patch because these APIs are brand new and because 11.7.0 never made it to Nuget anyway)

## 11.7.0 - 2017-10-30
* [#1047](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/pull/1047) Support for listing source transactions
* [#1049](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/pull/1049) Support for listing and retrieving exchange rates

## 11.6.1 - 2017-10-24
* [#1044](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/pull/1044) Improvements to parameter encoding
    * Main user-facing fix is that dictionary keys are now URL-encoded correctly (in case they contained characters incompatible with URLs)

## 11.6.0 - 2017-10-19
* [#1035](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet#1035) Signature fixes for webhook signature verification
    * Explicitly dispose of `HMACSHA256` after use so that its buffer cannot be inadvertently leaked
    * Use `SafeUTF8.GetBytes` so that unrecognized codepoints are not silently replaced with "?"
* [#1040](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/pull/1040) Add a few field definitions that were missing from API resources

## 11.5.0 - 2017-10-16
* [#1034](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet#1034) Add `Customer` to `StripeBankAccount`

## 11.4.0 - 2017-10-13
* [#1031](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet#1031) Support for manual subscription payments

## 11.3.0 - 2017-10-11
* [#1028](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet#1028) Support for attaching/detaching sources to/from customers
* [#1029](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet#1029) Correctly encode custom coupon and plan IDs in API URLs

## 11.2.0 - 2017-10-10
* [#986](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet#986) Add support for shipping on customer create and update
* [#997](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet#997) Add support for the Ephmeral Key API resource

## 11.1.0 - 2017-10-10
* [#1002](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet#1002) Add access for `StripeResponse` on `StripeException`
* [#1005](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet#1005) Add support for updating card source expiration date
* [#1008](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet#1008) Use bearer authorization everywhere and by default
* [#1021](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet#1021) Add `PreferredLanguage` for Bancontact sources

## 11.0.0 - 2017-10-10
* [#1007](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet#1007) Add support for Apple Pay Domain resource
* [#1018](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet#1018) Add event constants `ChargeRefundUpdated` and `InvoiceUpcoming`
* [#1019](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet#1019) Add `StripeChargeCaptureOptions` and use it for charge capture
* [#1022](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet#1022) Add support for SKUs
* [#1025](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet#1025) Add `Discountable` for `StripeInvoiceLineItem`

## Older releases

Note that this changelog is relatively new and we haven't yet backfilled it.
For details on old releases, check out the releases page:

https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/releases
```

TITLE: Example Markdown Release Note Entry
DESCRIPTION: Example format of a release note entry showing version number, date, PR reference and changes made.
SOURCE: https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_32

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
## 39.84.0 - 2021-12-22
* [#2406](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/pull/2406) API Updates
  * Add support for `AuBecsDebit` on `PaymentIntentPaymentMethodOptionsOptions`, `PaymentIntentPaymentMethodOptionsOptions`, `PaymentIntentPaymentMethodOptionsOptions`, and `PaymentIntentPaymentMethodOptions`
  
* [#2405](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/pull/2405) API Updates
  * Add support for `Boleto` on `SetupAttemptPaymentMethodDetails`
  
* [#2404](https://github.com/stripe/stripe-dotnet/pull/2404) API Updates
  * Add support for `Processing` on `PaymentIntent`
```

